documentation:
Returns the value of a cache entry matching key or null if key is not found. 
  #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/modules-1/cache-module#get-key)

detail: key as string, val as Object, ttl as number
documentation:
Sets or update a cache entry. 
  #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/modules-1/cache-module#set-key-val-ttl-null)

detail: key as string, chk as Object, val as Object, ttl as number
documentation:
Atomic compare and swap. Returns updated (Boolean) true if the value was set, or false if the cache value did not initially equal chk. 
  #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/modules-1/cache-module#cas-key-chk-val-ttl-null)

Clears cache values starting with search (or the entire cache).Returns removed (Number) the number of keys removed. 
  #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/modules-1/cache-module#clear-search)

Returns a count of cache entries starting with search (or the entire cache). 
  #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/modules-1/cache-module#count-search)

Removes the cache entries with a key matching key. Returns removed (Boolean) true if the value was removed. 
  #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/modules-1/cache-module#del-key)

detail: search as string, skip as number, limit as number[1 to 1000]
documentation:
Returns an array of matching entry key/value pairs, sorted by key. 
  #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/modules-1/cache-module#find-search-skip-0-limit-100)

Returns true if a cache entry matching key exists. For use in cases where null is a valid entry value. 
  #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/modules-1/cache-module#has-key)

detail: search as string, skip as number, limit as number[1 to 1000]
documentation:
Returns an array of matching entry metadata, sorted by key. List results may include recently expired keys. 
  #### [go to docs](https://docs.medable.com/cortex-api/scripting/modules-1/cache-module#list-search-skip-0-limit-100)
